## validateIdPrefix() function

Checks if a string is a valid Hop ID prefix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function validateIdPrefix<T extends IdPrefixes = IdPrefixes>(prefix: string, expect?: T): prefix is T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  prefix | string | A string that is a potential prefix |
|  expect | T | <i>(Optional)</i> An expected prefix to check against |

<b>Returns:</b>

prefix is T

- Whether the prefix is valid
